value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, new Heroes, it's time. I hope
your preparations are complete.$k$pWe've got enemies coming in from
this direction. We're going to be
counting on you to hold them off!$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|Understood, Commander Anna.
Leave it to us.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器アルフレッド,ch19_05_Alfred_M_Weapon01,Face|We're with you, Divine One.$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|Our first deployment... I only hope
we can be of some use to the
Order of Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器アルフレッド,ch19_05_Alfred_M_Weapon01,Face|There's not a doubt in my mind.
When I'm by your side, I always
feel ready for anything.$k$p$WmMPID_セリーヌ,ch19_08_Celine_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. We will face our battles here
just as capably as we did in Elyos,
thanks to you.$k$p$WmMPID_クロエ,ch19_10_Chloe_F_Normal,Face|I completely agree. As long as you're
with us, we can't lose.$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|I should be the one saying that to
all of you. I'd be helpless without
so many wonderful friends.$k$pI have to believe the Emblems are
watching over us too.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器アルフレッド,ch19_05_Alfred_M_Weapon01,Face|They really won't be able to help us
this time, will they?$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|I'm afraid not. Even with the rings,
the invocations just don't seem to
work here in Askr.$k$pI guess we've finally gone somewhere
they can't follow.$k$p$WmMPID_セリーヌ,ch19_08_Celine_F_Normal,Face|Do not despair, Divine One. I am sure
the Emblems will find their way to
us eventually.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器アルフレッド,ch19_05_Alfred_M_Weapon01,Face|Yeah! They probably just had to run
the long way around.$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|Heh! Thanks, I needed that. And
maybe you're right. Either way, no
point worrying about it now.$k$pLet's focus on what's in front of us.
Fight like the Emblems and all the
others are watching.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Here they come. Brace yourselves!$k$p$WmMPID_リュール女,ch19_01_Lueue_F_Normal,Face|All right, everyone—let's make our
friends proud!$k$p
